description: Mission Fig is an amazing plant species, treasured for its delicious fruit. The Mission Fig tree creates a striking display of large, dark green leaves and a gnarled, deep brown, charismatic trunk. Its succulent fruit is borne in abundance and has a rich flavor of sweet honey. Not only are Mission Figs excellent for fresh eating but they also make delicious jams and jellies. The Mission Fig is sure to captivate any onlooker with its beauty and fullness of fruit. It is sure to be a rare and amazing addition to any garden.
